name: Ghost Protocol
description:
You play as a ghost in Ghost Protocol! Coordinate with other ghosts to open doors and access new areas of the map.

Credits:

Two music tracks sourced from www.freesound.org under CC:

i) https://freesound.org/people/Timbre/sounds/425114/

ii) https://freesound.org/people/Victor_Natas/sounds/623137/

Name of the font is Ranchers. Downloaded from Google Fonts.

Software used: Unity,  VS Code, Clip Studio Paint, Audacity etc.
